segments.advisor_message: Okay, so let’s talk about your income sources. Can you tell me who owns this income or mayb—uh, like the, um, name of the income source?
segments.client_message: Uhhh, yeah, um, it’s my salary, I guess? I mean, it’s me who gets it, y’know? Like, I work at the tech company and stuff.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And, uh, what’s the amount you earn? And like, how often do you get this salary?  Monthly or...
segments.client_message: Ah, right, um, I make like, uh, two thousand dollars every month? Yeah, every month, and that’s before tax, I think, not sure.
